expertiseDomains.expertise:
Stéphanie Lombardi advises and represents
private and corporate clients in domestic and
international litigation and arbitration, in civil and
commercial disputes.

She ensures the enforcement of foreign and
national decisions and arbitral awards, in particular
by means of civil seizure of assets and recognition
proceedings.

Stéphanie Lombardi advises entrepreneurs,
companies and private clients on the negotiation
and drafting in a national and international scope
of all types of commercial contracts, including
manufacturing, distribution, licensing, sponsoring,
joint venture, franchise, non-disclosure, lease,
service, sale and purchase agreements.

She also assists clients with corporate law matters
that arise during the business life of their company.

Stéphanie Lombardi advises and represents Swiss
and multinational clients in all matters relating to
employment law, including negotiation, drafting
and review of employment contracts, termination
agreements, bonus scheme, non-compete and
non-solicit provisions. She further advises clients
on their internal policies and assists them with the
preparation and enforcement of individual and
collective dismissals.

She also regularly assists individuals in obtaining
residence and work permits and companies with
the transfer and secondment of employees.
